content:
# The Stone Furnace is now actively working, consuming 1 Iron Ore and 1 Coal to produce Iron Plates. 
# It currently has 9 Iron Ore left and 4 Coal remaining. 

# I need to wait for the smelting process to complete. 
# I will monitor the furnace for up to 30 seconds to check if it produces Iron Plates.

for _ in range(30):  # Maximum wait time of 30 seconds
    if inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 1:
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# After confirming that Iron Plates have been produced, I will check the inventory again.
print(f'Final inventory: {inspect_inventory()}')  # Check the final inventory after smelting.
